definition: variant of 宏圖|宏图[hong2 tu2]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Let us all now drink a toast to the future success of the company.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們大家一起來乾杯，祝公司未來鴻圖大展。

sentences.english: It is at ground level at the junction of Hung To Road and Tsun Yip Street.
sentences.chinese: 位於地面並在鴻圖道與駿業街交界處。

sentences.english: It lies along the frontage adjoining to the pavement at Hung To Road.
sentences.chinese: 沿毗鄰鴻圖道行人路的臨街地界。

sentences.english: In the second world war, the company began a brighter future.
sentences.chinese: 在二次世界大戰之後，公司開始大展鴻圖。

sentences.english: Believe that your life is worth living and your beliefs will help create the fact.
sentences.chinese: 要堅信生存價值，這份堅信必助你建立鴻圖偉略。

sentences.english: The whole world is your oyster.
sentences.chinese: 整個世界都是你大展鴻圖之地。

definition: to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
to take turns/to work by roster
lit. to fix the tone with a single hammer blow/fig. to make the final decision
door knocker (in the shape of a ring)
plan of convenience (idiom); stop-gap measure/makeshift stratagem/interim step
